critical_actions.name: Set state: needs_deploy
docs: The action set devices with request to be redeployed.

critical_actions.name: Validate DUT info
docs: Check Android DUT info for repair.

critical_actions.name: Validate associated host
docs: Check availability of associated host of the DUT.

dependencies.name: Associated host is pingable
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is reachable over ping.
This should happen as soon as the network driver gets loaded and the network becomes operational.

dependencies.name: Associated host is accessible over SSH
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is accessible over ssh.

dependencies.name: Associated host is labstation
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is a labstation.

recoveries.name: Schedule associated host reboot and fail
docs: Schedules reboot of the DUT associated host and fails repair till the next run.

conditions.name: Associated host is pingable
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is reachable over ping.
This should happen as soon as the network driver gets loaded and the network becomes operational.

conditions.name: Associated host is accessible over SSH
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is accessible over ssh.

conditions.name: Associated host is labstation
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is a labstation.

critical_actions.name: Lock associated host
docs: Creates a file to indicate that the associated host is in use.

dependencies.name: Validate associated host
docs: Check availability of associated host of the DUT.

dependencies.name: Associated host is pingable
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is reachable over ping.
This should happen as soon as the network driver gets loaded and the network becomes operational.

dependencies.name: Associated host is accessible over SSH
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is accessible over ssh.

dependencies.name: Associated host is labstation
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is a labstation.

recoveries.name: Schedule associated host reboot and fail
docs: Schedules reboot of the DUT associated host and fails repair till the next run.

conditions.name: Associated host is pingable
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is reachable over ping.
This should happen as soon as the network driver gets loaded and the network becomes operational.

conditions.name: Associated host is accessible over SSH
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is accessible over ssh.

conditions.name: Associated host is labstation
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is a labstation.

critical_actions.name: Validate adb
docs: This verifier checks whether adb and vendor key are properly provisioned on associated host of the DUT and adb server is running.

dependencies.name: Associated host has adb

dependencies.name: Associated host has adb
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT has adb installed.

dependencies.name: Adb server is stopped
docs: Stops Adb server if it is running on associated host of the DUT.

recoveries.name: Schedule associated host reboot and fail
docs: Schedules reboot of the DUT associated host and fails repair till the next run.

conditions.name: Associated host is pingable
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is reachable over ping.
This should happen as soon as the network driver gets loaded and the network becomes operational.

docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is accessible over ssh.

conditions.name: Associated host is labstation
docs: This verifier checks whether associated host of the DUT is a labstation.

recoveries.name: Reboot device if in fastboot mode
docs: Reboot the device via fastboot if the device is in fastboot mode.

docs: Waits for DUT to become available.

docs: Reconnect device if the device is in offline state.

critical_actions.name: Set state: ready
docs: Final state of Android DUT indicating successful repair.

critical_actions.name: Unlock associated host
docs: Removes in-use file to release the associated host.

critical_actions.name: Update DUT state for failures more than threshold
docs: Set the DUT state to the value passed in the extra args.

conditions.name: DUT state is repair_failed
docs: Check if the DUT's state is in repair_failed state, if not then fail.

conditions.name: Failure count above threshold
docs: Check if the number of continuously recovery task failures are greater than a threshold value.

dependencies.name: Set state: needs_manual_repair
docs: Set DUT state as needs_manual_repair.
